channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Redirection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Redirection

item.title: CVE-2023-1331|2024-08-02T05:40:59.887Z -- unknown -- redirection
item.description: The Redirection WordPress plugin before 1.1.5 does not have CSRF checks in the uninstall action, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete all the redirections through a CSRF attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-1330|2024-08-02T05:41:00.067Z -- unknown -- redirection
item.description: The Redirection WordPress plugin before 1.1.4 does not add nonce verification in place when adding the redirect, which could allow attackers to add redirects via a CSRF attack.
